summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3364, for the improvement of North 80th Street, from the existing sewer west of Aurora Avenue to Woodland Park Avenue, under Ordinance No. 41525 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
